plot: The freelance reporter Alfredo Torrisi is exploring a war zone with his assistant. When Alfredo is in front of his camera, he steps on a mine. The assistant goes search help. Alfredo is alone, the camera is shooting.
title: C'était pour vous Alfredo Torrisi
plot_es: The freelance reporter Alfredo Torrisi is exploring a war zone with his assistant. When Alfredo is in front of his camera, he steps on a mine. The assistant goes search help. Alfredo is alone, the camera is shooting.
plot_en: The freelance reporter Alfredo Torrisi is exploring a war zone with his assistant. When Alfredo is in front of his camera, he steps on a mine. The assistant goes search help. Alfredo is alone, the camera is shooting.
